text: Is there any legitimate use for package shadowing? I can't think of one.

elements.text: Is there any legitimate use for package shadowing? I can't think of one.

text: It has already been mentioned earlier: migration of a package from one repository to another, e.g. a private registry to General, where older versions are only available in the former registry.

elements.text: It has already been mentioned earlier: migration of a package from one repository to another, e.g. a private registry to General, where older versions are only available in the former registry.

text: Both :invenia: and :beacon-biosignals: have done exactly that
